patterns: What types of cars do you sell?
responses: We offer a wide range of cars, including new and used vehicles.
Our inventory includes both new and pre-owned cars from various brands.

patterns: Can I pay with credit card?
responses: We accept credit card payments and offer financing options for your convenience.
You can pay with credit card or explore our financing solutions.

patterns: When will I receive my car?
responses: Once purchased, you can expect delivery within 2-7 business days, depending on your location.
The delivery time for purchased cars typically ranges from 2-7 business days, based on your location.

patterns: Which type of brands are available?
responses: Yes, we have Toyota,Ford,Porce,Honda cars in our inventory.
You can find a variety of Toyota,Ford,Porce,Honda vehicles in our showroom.
Our inventory includes popular brands like Toyota,Ford,Porce,Honda.

patterns: What features do your cars have?
Can you tell me about the features of your cars?
responses: Our cars come with various features, including advanced safety technologies, infotainment systems, and more.

patterns: Can I get maintenance done at your dealership?
responses: Yes, we provide maintenance services for your convenience.
You can schedule car servicing appointments with us.
Our dealership offers comprehensive maintenance solutions for your vehicle.

patterns: How can I schedule a test drive?
Can I book a test drive online?
What's the process for scheduling a test drive?
responses: You can easily schedule a test drive by contacting us through phone or email.
Feel free to book a test drive online or visit our dealership to arrange one.
To schedule a test drive, simply reach out to us and we'll assist you with the process.

patterns: Can I get insurance for my new car?
What insurance options do you have?
responses: Yes, we can help you with car insurance for your new vehicle.
Explore our insurance options for your car to ensure comprehensive coverage.
We offer various insurance plans tailored to your car's needs.

patterns: Can I trade in my current car?
responses: Yes, we accept trade-in vehicles. Contact us for an evaluation of your current car's value.
